settings.text: Hello, I'm Matt Holland, the founder of DIY Building Supplies. With a genuine passion for the construction industry, I wanted to create a company that puts people first. Our mission is simple: to provide you with the best quality materials at affordable prices.

Hello, I'm Matt Holland, the founder of DIY Building Supplies. With a genuine passion for the construction industry, I wanted to create a company that puts people first. Our mission is simple: to provide you with the best quality materials at affordable prices.

settings.button_label: Ask us for advice or specific requirements →

settings.title: Account manager
settings.text: When you work with DIY Building Supplies, you benefit from the perfect combination of professionalism and personal treatment, plus insider knowledge that only comes with years of experience in the industry.

settings.title: One stop shop
settings.text: We created our site so it’s easy to find exactly what you’re looking for. We even offer next day delivery upon request. You save time and money and enjoy a seamless ordering experience.

settings.title: Free Delivery Over £350
settings.text: Have your building material supplies delivered nationwide in as little as three days with free delivery when you spend over £350 ex VAT

settings.heading: We took building supplies online so you can benefit from value, quality and ease of delivery.

settings.text:
We founded DIY Building Supplies because we wanted to bring better service to the world of building trade supplies and DIY building materials. All too often, we found contractors were not receiving the high-quality materials and dedicated service they needed for their projects.

And DIYers often struggle with that same lack of service when sourcing the right materials for what they need. We believe everyone should have access to the best materials at the best price.

settings.heading: At DIY Building Supplies we know our products inside and out and want to help make your project a success.

settings.text:
Whether working with passionate DIYers or using our trade contacts to secure the best products for contractors and construction companies, our service is always the same: personalised, efficient and guided by great prices.

We work hard to source and select top quality building material supplies so you have everything you need to take a project from start to finish. Combine that with our excellent industry connections and you can trust that you are getting quality.

Through my years of experience and industry connections, we have built a network that allows us to source premium materials without the hefty price tag. We believe that everyone should have access to top-notch supplies without compromising on quality. At DIY Building Supplies, we strive to be your trusted partner on your construction journey. We understand the challenges you face and the importance of honest guidance.

Our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way, offering personalised support and sharing insights from our own experiences. We take pride in building lasting relationships with our customers, and we're committed to delivering exceptional value. By working with us, you can trust that you're getting the best materials at the best prices, backed by our honest and human approach. Thank you for choosing DIY Building Supplies. We look forward to being a part of your building projects and helping you turn your vision into reality.

Matt Holland - Founder
